title: Evaporative Pressure Relief Hose - Assembly

body.body: A check valve is fitted into the pressure relief hose.
Always fit the pressure relief hose in the correct orientation.
An incorrectly fitted pressure relief hose may cause vapour to be released under pressure when the filler cap is opened.
Do not attempt to adjust the position or remove the check valve.
The check valve is positioned in the hose during manufacture.
Do not remove the check valve from the pressure relief hose.
The check valve is an integral part of the pressure relief hose and is only available as an assembly.
The check valve is fitted to the pressure relief hose as shown below.
When fitted correctly, the T-piece outlet for the pressure relief hose must face towards the center of the motorcycle.
Fit the fuel tank evaporative hoses until they are fully pushed up to the T-piece flange.
Evaporative hose, fuel tank to T-piece
Evaporative hose, evaporative canister to T-piece
T-Piece To Fuel Drain Hoses Assembly
When fitted correctly, the T-piece outlet for the pressure relief hose must face towards the center of the motorcycle.
Fit the fuel tank drain hoses until they are fully pushed up to the T-piece flange.
Fuel drain hose, fuel tank to T-piece
Fuel drain hose, T-piece to atmosphere
